name: GetEnterpriseUsers
description:
Retrieve users of a Trello enterprise account.

Use this tool to get information on users within a Trello enterprise. You can specify the type of users to retrieve, such as licensed members or board guests. The response is paginated, returning up to 100 users per request.

parameters.name: enterprise_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Trello enterprise whose users you want to retrieve. This is required to identify the target enterprise.

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.

parameters.name: filter_active_since_date
parameters.description: Filter users active on or after this date (inclusive). Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DD').

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: active_since_date
parameters.description: Returns only Trello users who have been active since this date (inclusive). Should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: search_value
parameters.description: Provide a string to find members whose email address or full name starts with this value.

value_schema.description: Returns members with email address or full name that start with the search value.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor string to retrieve the next batch of users. Use the cursor returned from the previous response.

value_schema.description: Cursor to return next set of results, use cursor returned in the response to query the next batch.

parameters.name: licensed_members_filter
parameters.description: Set to true to return licensed members; false for unlicensed members; unspecified returns both.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who possess a license for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who do not. If unspecified, both licensed and unlicensed members will be returned.

parameters.name: return_deactivated_members
parameters.description: Set to true to return deactivated members, set to false for active members. If unspecified, returns both.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who have been deactivated for the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who have not. If unspecified, both active and deactivated members will be returned.

parameters.name: include_guests_without_license
parameters.description: Set to true to include members who are guests on boards without a license. False excludes them. Defaults to both.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are guests on one or more boards in the corresponding Trello Enterprise (but do not possess a license); when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both guests and non-guests will be returned.

parameters.name: include_managed_users
parameters.description: Set to true to return users managed by the Trello Enterprise; false to exclude them. If unspecified, both managed and unmanaged users are returned.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are managed by the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both managed and unmanaged members will be returned.

parameters.name: retrieve_administrators
parameters.description: Set true to get members who are administrators, false for non-administrators, or leave unspecified for all.

value_schema.description: When true, returns members who are administrators of the corresponding Trello Enterprise; when false, returns members who are not. If unspecified, both admin and non-admin members will be returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: activeSince

value_schema.description: Returns only Trello users active since this date (inclusive).

parameters.name: inactiveSince

parameters.name: id

value_schema.description: ID of the enterprise to retrieve.
